## tooling-feature-module package

Tooling functions to implement support for feature modules.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [generateFeatureModule(options)](./tooling-feature-module.generatefeaturemodule.md) | Command to add <code>ng-add</code> support to a feature module. |
